Desc.eng: A dark dungeon with a grim interrogator! It brings back such sweet memories. Let’s do this!
Excruciating Caress… It sounds effective. Do it.
Khhm. “Since you stoooole my heeeeart… my life is nothing but… everlasting suuuffffeeee-ring…”
So… A poem. “How I loathe thee/With a passion simply too deep/ While the dawn is gently kissing the mountain / My bleeding heart can’t sustain/This suffocating pain!”
Look, it’s a blackboard. Now I’m going to gently caress it… wait for it… scratching it with my… NAILS!
Aaargh! NO! Stop it! I’ll talk!! The Cult of Seven has a hideout in the Thunderhead Mountains! In the Haunted Forest! I was sent here to rob laboratories, I don’t know anything else!

This is TERRIBLE! Stop it! Stop! The Cult of Seven has a hideout in the Thunderhead Mountains, in the woods formerly known as the Haunted Forest! I was sent here to rob laboratories, I don’t know anything else!

Aaargh….! YOU MONSTER! I'll talk! The Cult of Seven has a hideout in the Thunderhead Mountains, in the woods formerly known as the Haunted Forest! I was sent here to rob laboratories, I don’t know anything else!
Patience, Katarina. We should give our prisoner the opportunity to talk before we start torturing him.
I will never talk, Van Helsing! The Faceless Tsar will be triumphant!
Thought so. Look, I don’t want to resort to unnecessary brutality, but I’ll do anything to stop your cult and find your faceless leader. Jailor, do your best.
Umm, yes. Right away… you might want to step out for a bit.
Absolutely not! Do you have any idea when I last witnessed something like this?

But we have never had any prisoners, so this is the first time for me… Can you help me to choose the perfect method? I could try Everlasting Suffering. Or should I resort to the Suffocating Pain? Or, if you dare to watch, I can use the Excruciating Caress.
Everlasting Suffering. Sounds… uncomfortable. Try it.
Suffocating Pain sounds like something the old Borgovian vampire princes would have used. Try that.
